i1.name: An_Acquired_Taste
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Tahm Kench's''' [[basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}} and {{ai|Tongue Lash|Tahm Kench}} deal {{pp|8 to 60|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% of his '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.

{{sbc|Passive:}} Basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} and {{ai|Tongue Lash|Tahm Kench}} against enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} apply ''An Acquired Taste'' [[stack]] for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on {{ai|Tongue Lash|Tahm Kench}} and subsequent attacks. The stacks decay once every {{fd|0.67}} seconds when the duration ends.
{{ai|Tongue Lash|Tahm Kench}} and {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} gain additional effects against enemies with 3 stacks.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Tahm Kench's basic attacks on-hit and Tahm Kench's Tongue Lash deal 8 − 60 (based on level) (+ 2.5% of his bonus health) bonus magic damage.
Passive: Basic attacks on-hit and Tahm Kench's Tongue Lash against enemy champions apply An Acquired Taste stack for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on Tahm Kench's Tongue Lash and subsequent attacks. The stacks decay once every 0.67 seconds when the duration ends.
Tahm Kench's Tongue Lash and Tahm Kench's Devour gain additional effects against enemies with 3 stacks.
i1.notes: * The passive bonus damage applies to turrets.

q1.name: Tongue_Lash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tahm Kench''' lashes his tongue out in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 50% for 2 seconds, as well as {{tip|healing}} himself if they are a champion.
If an enemy champion is struck while at three {{ai|An Acquired Taste|Tahm Kench}} stacks, all of their stacks are consumed to {{tip|stun}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
During ''Tongue Lash'', {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} can be cast at no cost to swallow the target enemy champion hit while at 3 {{ai|An Acquired Taste|Tahm Kench}} stacks after pulling them towards him.

'''''Tahm Kench''' is unable to move, attack, or cast {{ai|Abyssal Dive|Tahm Kench}} or {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} on a different target while his tongue is in flight. Tongue Lash's range and travel speed can be increased by '''Tahm Kench's''' [[size]].''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Tahm Kench lashes his tongue out in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by 50% for 2 seconds, as well as healing himself if they are a champion.
If an enemy champion is struck while at three Tahm Kench's An Acquired Taste stacks, all of their stacks are consumed to stun them for 1.5 seconds.
During Tongue Lash, Tahm Kench's Devour can be cast at no cost to swallow the target enemy champion hit while at 3 Tahm Kench's An Acquired Taste stacks after pulling them towards him.
Tahm Kench is unable to move, attack, or cast Tahm Kench's Abyssal Dive or Tahm Kench's Devour on a different target while his tongue is in flight. Tongue Lash's range and travel speed can be increased by Tahm Kench's size.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 280}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}
{{ai|An Acquired Taste|Tahm Kench|(+ {{pp|8 to 60|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% '''bonus''' health)}})}}}} {{st|Heal|{{ap|10 to 30}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4 to 6}}% of '''missing''' health)}}}}
q1.notes:
* '''Tongue Lash's''' range and speed scale 1:1 alongside any [[size]] modifiers to '''Tahm Kench''', but will not be reduced ''below'' their base values if his overall size modifier is smaller than 100%.
** As the missile range and speed scale simultaneously, '''Tongue Lash''' will always take {{rutngt|{{#expr: 900/2800}}}} to reach its maximum range (no matter the cast range).
** Because of this, increasing '''Tahm Kench's''' size with items such as {{ii|Frostfire Gauntlet}}, {{ii|Gargoyle Stoneplate}} and/or {{ii|Elixir of Iron}} allows him to hit targets at even the same distance more quickly and giving them less time to dodge.
* {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} can be 'queued' at any point during ''Tongue Lash'' (including the wind-up animation) and will not go on cooldown if '''Tahm Kench''' fails to hit a valid target with ''Tongue Lash''.
* All three {{ai|An Acquired Taste|Tahm Kench}} stacks will be consumed even if ''Tongue Lash's'' {{tip|stun}} is negated.
{{Effect at cast time start}}
{{ct|cast|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 70% AP)
    Tahm Kench's (+ 8 − 60 (based on level) (+ 2.5% bonus health))
  • Heal: (+ % of missing health)

st_slices:
(+ 70% AP)
Tahm Kench's (+ 8 − 60 (based on level) (+ 2.5% bonus health))

w1.name: Abyssal_Dive
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tahm Kench''' dives into the waters, {{tip|channel|channeling}} for {{fd|1.35}} seconds and upon completion {{tip|blink|blinking}} to the target location, emerging after a {{fd|0.15}}-second delay and remaining {{tip|lockout|unable to act}} for {{fd|0.65}} seconds after the channel completes.

Upon emerging from the depths, '''Tahm Kench''' deals {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for 1 second. If ''Abyssal Dive'' hits at least one enemy {{tip|champion}}, 40% of its {{sti|cooldown}} and {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} cost are refunded.
Enemies can see the indicator for '''Tahm Kench's''' destination after he has channeled for {{fd|0.75}} seconds. '''Tahm Kench''' grants {{tip|sight}} of the area during the channel.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Tahm Kench dives into the waters, channeling for 1.35 seconds and upon completion blinking to the target location, emerging after a 0.15-second delay and remaining unable to act for 0.65 seconds after the channel completes.
Upon emerging from the depths, Tahm Kench deals magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them up and stuns them for 1 second. If Abyssal Dive hits at least one enemy champion, 40% of its cooldown and mana cost are refunded.
Enemies can see the indicator for Tahm Kench's destination after he has channeled for 0.75 seconds. Tahm Kench grants sight of the area during the channel.

e1.name: Thick_Skin
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Tahm Kench''' stores a percentage of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} he takes as [[Health#Grey health|grey health]] on his [[health bar]], up to a maximum of {{as|300% of his '''maximum''' health}}.  While there are at least 2 nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champions, either dead or alive, the damage stored into grey health is increased.

While ''Thick Skin'' is available, and after taking no damage for 4 seconds, '''Tahm Kench''' rapidly {{tip|heals}} himself to restore {{pp|key=%|45 to 100}} of his [[Health#Grey health|grey health]]. Every {{rutngt|0.25}} he heals for {{as|10% of his '''maximum''' health}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Tahm Kench''' converts his current [[Health#Grey health|grey health]] into a {{tip|shield}} that lasts for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percentage of the post-mitigation damage he takes as Health#Grey health on his health bar, up to a maximum of 300% of his maximum health. While there are at least 2 nearby visible enemy champions, either dead or alive, the damage stored into grey health is increased.
While Thick Skin is available, and after taking no damage for 4 seconds, Tahm Kench rapidly heals himself to restore 45% − 100% (based on level) of his Health#Grey health. Every 0.264 he heals for 10% of his maximum health.
Active: Tahm Kench converts his current Health#Grey health into a shield that lasts for 2.5 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Damage Stored into Grey Health|{{ap|15 to 55}}%}}
{{st|Increased Damage Stored into Grey Health|{{ap|45 to 65}}%}}
e1.notes:
* ''Thick Skin'' shield value and ''grey health'' percentage heal are both boosted by effects that increase heal and shield power. This means '''Tahm Kench''' can technically heal more than the normal amount of ''grey health'' and get a shield bigger than his maximum health.
** At level 18 '''Tahm Kench''' would need {{ap|(1/0.65-1)*100|round=1}}% {{sti|heal power}} to heal for 100% of the damage he takes, reduced to {{ap|(1/(0.65*1.1)-1.05)*100|round=1}}% with {{ri|Revitalize}}, {{ap|(1/(0.65*1.25)-1)*100|round=1}}% with {{ii|Spirit Visage}}, and {{ap|(1/(0.65*1.1*1.25)-1.05)*100|round=1}}% with both.
* ''Grey health'' converts all post-mitigation damage, ''Thick Skin'' effectively grants ''Tahm Kench'' a form of {{as|true damage}} mitigation.
* ''Grey health'' can temporarily exceed 100% of his missing health when '''Tahm Kench''' {{tt|heals through other means|Any other source of healing besides Thick Skin}} with a ''grey health'' bar at 100%. In that case he will keep the higher ''grey health'' value for a few moments until it updates and removes the amount that he healed.

• Damage Stored into Grey Health: %

subeffects.title: Increased Damage Stored into Grey Health

r1.name: Devour
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tahm Kench''' swallows the target {{tip|champion}} for up to 3 seconds, rendering them {{tip|vanish|vanished}} and {{tip|displacement immune}} for the duration.

If the target is an ally, they become {{tip|lockout|unable to act}} and are granted a {{tip|shield}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, refreshing after they are {{ai|Regurgitate|Tahm Kench|Regurgitated}}. '''Tahm Kench''' gains {{sti|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 3 seconds and is unable to cast movement spells, excluding {{ai|Abyssal Dive|Tahm Kench}}, while an ally is swallowed.

If the target is an enemy, they are {{tip|suppression|suppressed}} for the duration. ''Devour'' can only be cast on enemies with 3 {{ai|An Acquired Taste|Tahm Kench}} stacks, consuming them in the process. '''Tahm Kench''' is {{tip|ground|grounded}} and {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 40% while an enemy is swallowed.

After 1 second, ''Devour'' can be recast into {{ai|Regurgitate|Tahm Kench}} while a target is swallowed, and automatically does so at the end of the duration if they are still so. Allies can also input a movement command after the same delay to force '''Tahm Kench''' to use {{ai|Regurgitate|Tahm Kench}} in the target direction, unless they are {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}}.
''If '''Tahm Kench''' is performing {{ai|Abyssal Dive|Tahm Kench}}, {{ai|Regurgitate|Tahm Kench}} will not automatically cast until after he finishes.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Tahm Kench swallows the target champion for up to 3 seconds, rendering them vanished and displacement immune for the duration.
If the target is an ally, they become unable to act and are granted a shield for 2.5 seconds, refreshing after they are Tahm Kench's Regurgitated. Tahm Kench gains 40% bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and is unable to cast movement spells, excluding Tahm Kench's Abyssal Dive, while an ally is swallowed.
If the target is an enemy, they are suppressed for the duration. Devour can only be cast on enemies with 3 Tahm Kench's An Acquired Taste stacks, consuming them in the process. Tahm Kench is grounded and slowed by 40% while an enemy is swallowed.
After 1 second, Devour can be recast into Tahm Kench's Regurgitate while a target is swallowed, and automatically does so at the end of the duration if they are still so. Allies can also input a movement command after the same delay to force Tahm Kench to use Tahm Kench's Regurgitate in the target direction, unless they are immobilized.
If Tahm Kench is performing Tahm Kench's Abyssal Dive, Tahm Kench's Regurgitate will not automatically cast until after he finishes.
r1.notes:
* ''Devour'' will end prematurely under the following circumstances:
** The enemy target {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} the {{tip|suppression}}.
** '''Tahm Kench''' or his target dies.
*** If he dies during the cast time, the target will be dealt {{ais|Regurgitate|Tahm Kench}} damage.
** '''Tahm Kench''' enters {{tip|resurrection}}.
*** If he enters resurrection during the cast time, the target will be dealt {{ais|Regurgitate|Tahm Kench}} damage.
** '''Tahm Kench''' or his target enters or leaves the {{ai|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}}.
*** If the caster of that ability enters the realm, they will be {{ai|Regurgitate|Tahm Kench|Regurgitated}} instead.
* ''Devour'' cannot be used on allies that are {{tip|channel|channeling}} or using an ability that preloads {{tip|unstoppableforcemarker|UnstoppableForceMarker}}.
* ''Devour's'' swallow will be resisted by enemies that are {{tip|displacement immune}}.
* The target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|displacement immune}} on-cast, and will {{tip|vanish}} at the end of the cast time.
** Enemy targets will become {{tip|suppression|suppressed}} on-cast.
*** If the target {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} the suppression during the cast time they will not be swallowed at the end of the cast time.
* Swallowed enemy champions will receive the recast's damage regardless of how they leave '''Tahm Kench's''' belly.
* The {{tip|slow|self-slow}} is affected by {{tip|slow resist}}.
* '''Tahm Kench''' cannot use {{tip|Hex-gate|hex-gates}} during ''Devour''.
* Allies can see if this spell is ready next to '''Tahm Kench's''' health bar.
* The following table refers for interactions while the target is unable to act:
{{ct|attack=false|move=If an ally, forces '''Tahm Kench''' to use {{ai|Regurgitate|Tahm Kench}} unless movement commands are otherwise restricted. If an enemy, movement commands are disabled.|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=false|interrupts=death}}
{{ct|cast|items=false|consume=false|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}
r1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|120 to 80}}|Starts post-effect}}' as '120/100/80' and riot's value '0,0,0' as '0'

r2.name: Regurgitate
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tahm Kench''' {{tip|airborne|spits}} the target out in the target direction. If the target is an enemy, they are dealt {{as|magic damage}} at the end of the displacement.
r2.descriptionHtml: Active: Tahm Kench spits the target out in the target direction. If the target is an enemy, they are dealt magic damage at the end of the displacement.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 400}} {{as|(+ 15% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
r2.notes:
* ''Regurgitate'' will also automatically cast if '''Tahm Kench''' or his target is affected by {{ai|Fate's Call|Kalista}} or his target enters {{tip|resurrection}}.
* '''Tahm Kench''' becomes {{tip|lockout|unable to act}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds upon casting ''Regurgitate''.
r2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 100,100,100 as 100

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 15% (+ 5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

st_slices: (+ 15% (+ 5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)
